entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:37 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
